parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: EnableUserPrometheus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Prometheus on the customer side. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: OperationName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration update operation.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The configuration parameters of the service instance.

parameters.name: PredefinedParametersName
parameters.description: The name of the specification package.
